alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Kipahulu; Koolau Windward; Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 20 at 4:04AM HST until December 20 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR THE EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND BIG ISLAND... .A slowly lowering northeast swell, along with fresh to strong trades, supports extending the High Surf Advisory for most east- facing shores through today. East surf is expected to fall below advisory levels tonight into early Thursday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf 8 to 12 feet in Kauai, 7 to 10 feet in Oahu, Molokai, Maui and Big Island. * WHERE...Kauai East, Koolau Windward, Olomana, Molokai Windward, Molokai Southeast, Windward Haleakala, Kipahulu, Big Island East and Big Island North. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
